ThingDef.description: The Nameless uniform is designed to be simple and practical while offering some combat protection. The uniform features a dark color scheme, primarily consisting of black and red, giving it a low-profile yet professional appearance. The top is a tight-fitting military-style jacket with a high collar, fastened with metal buttons that reflect the discipline and rigor characteristic of soldiers. The shoulders and sleeves are reinforced with extra padding to protect against minor injuries. The chest area includes a zippered pocket, suitable for carrying small combat gear or communication devices.
ThingDef.label: Nameless Uniform

ThingDef.description: The belt and multifunctional pockets on the pants add practicality to the uniform, making it convenient to carry ammunition, tools, and medical supplies. The overall fit of the uniform is tailored, ensuring it doesn't hinder movement during combat while still providing necessary protection. The footwear consists of high boots made from sturdy leather, offering excellent protection and support across various challenging terrains. The boots are also equipped with reinforced metal guards to prevent ankle injuries during battle.
ThingDef.label: Nameless Pants

ThingDef.description: The bulletproof pants are made from durable, wear-resistant materials, with adjustable cuffed hems to accommodate different combat boots. The pockets on the pants are strategically placed, capable of holding various tools and combat supplies. The waist is equipped with a reinforced tactical belt, which helps to evenly distribute the weight of the gear, reducing the burden during extended operations. The combat boots are high-topped, made from sturdy leather and waterproof materials, providing excellent grip and protection in a wide range of challenging terrains.
ThingDef.label: Nameless FlakPants
